title: Incorrect Zoom Account
content:
Bidtellect default when trying to create a new meeting invite. If there is an issue with Chrome holding onto the old bidtellect zoom information, go to your Chrome extensions and Remove Zoom from your browser. chrome://extensions/ Once removed you can add the plug in back and you will get prompted asking if you want to save and transfer any old files/data into the new simpli.fi account. Select yes for all prompts and this will fix the issue.

Page Labels: dws-user, virtual_agent
